entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, who is trying to escape from the skrewt.

entities.name: skrewt
entities.description: A creature that is chasing Harry and has a fleshy, shell-less underside.

entities.name: impedimenta
entities.description: A spell cast by Harry to slow down the skrewt.

relationships.description: The skrewt is chasing Harry, as evident from the text where it says 'The skrewt was inches from him when it froze...'
Harry casts the Impediment Curse on the skrewt, as evident from the text where it says '“IMPEDIMENTA!” The spell hit the skrewt’s armor again and ricocheted off...'
The Impediment Curse is cast on the skrewt, which is trying to chase Harry.
